channel.title: Getting Rich in a Geeky Way
channel.description: Recent content on Getting Rich in a Geeky Way

item.title: 2017 September Dividends Update
item.description: Since September is the quarterly dividends distribution month, the dividends income received this month is my best since I started my investment one and half years ago. According to the figure, we can see the average monthly dividends have reached a small milestone of $300/month. I was planning to increase the monthly dividends to $400/month at the end of this year, which requires another $30,000 under the assumption of 4% dividends rate.

item.title: Google Sheet XIRR Function Calculates CAGR (Compound Annual Growth Rate)
item.description: Function introduction. What is XIRR. Example. Real usage.

item.title: HST Remitting with Quick Method at Ontario
item.description: My accountant just helped me with reporting my corporation tax T2 for year 2016. It ended up with owing a large amount of HST to the Mr. Taxman. To understand how HST is calculated, I read more and understand what regular / quick method of accounting is. You can find several posts (e.g. here ) which give a clear explanation. Basically, it makes sense for most small entrepreneur to use quick method to remit HST.
